jobDescription:
This position is for competent individuals who will be required to work in Delhi (India) to set up the Company's base in India.

Job Description

Position: Sr. Software Engineer / Software Engineer (Exact designation may vary as per the candidate's experience)

Note: We are looking for an individual contributor, who can work with Team Lead in delivering the project deliverables as per project scope and schedule.


We are looking for a functionally skilled person who can manage several projects and deliver robust solutions.
Job Responsibilities:

  • A clear understanding of the iOS application development life cycle.
  • Excellent knowledge of Swift and iOS SDK and experience in building mobile applications for iOS.
  • Good understanding of architecture patterns, design principles, interface guidelines and best practices.
  • Experience in writing unit tests, UI automation and CI/CD and automation tools
  • Analyze requirements and implement them into an application.
  • Good understanding of native iOS frameworks.
  • Develop advanced native applications for the iOS platform using Swift and Objective-C.
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services.
  • Ability to communicate technical concepts clearly and effectively.
  • Good Skill in UI Design is Mandatory.
  • Design and build applications for the iOS platform.
  • Experience working with A/B testing, Event frameworks will be a plus.
  • Ensure the performance, quality, security, and responsiveness of applications.
  • Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
  • Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
  • Design, build, and maintain high-performance, reusable, and reliable.
  • Complete day-to-day tasks and update on Jira or Backlog, and write documentation on Confluence or GitHub if needed.
  • Collaborate with the Android team, the Web(backend/frontend) team, and the QA team for the day-to-day tasks.
  • Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.

Required Skills:

  • Experience:
    • Experience Required: 3 - 8 yrs
    • Area of Expertise
      • Swift & SwiftUI (MUST HAVE)
      • Objective-C
      • Software Development
      • Mobile App Development
      • iOS Application Development
  • Skills
    • Swift / SwiftUI / Objective-C / RESTful API


Additional Requirements

  • The candidate must have solid ENGLISH COMMUNICATION skills.
  • Ability to build and maintain positive relationships with colleagues.
  • Knowledge of travel, tourism, and software development.
  • Hardworking, passionate, punctual & time management.
  • Excellent understanding of OOP and design patterns & principles.
  • GitHub, Slack, Backlog, Jira, Confluence.
  • Analytical skills and advanced arithmetic skills.
  • The quality-minded approach throughout the Software Development Life Cycle.
  • Approaching very structured and systematic work.
  • Ensuring the systems are functioning properly and helping the business run smoothly.
  • Responsibilities for the deadline and quality of the services.
  • Educational Qualification
    Degree: B.Tech/M.Tech in CS. Bachelor degree in any discipline

    Candidates with work experience in travel product companies shall be highly preferred.

    Work location : New Delhi, India
    Working Hours : Mon-Fri / 08:30-17:30

title: Hardware Design Engineer - AI Camera Development
tagsAndSkills: Hardware Design And Development,Troubleshooting and Debugging,Circuit Designing,Embedded Systems Development,Algorithm Implementation and Optimization,Sensor and Camera Technologies,Software-Hardware Integration,Prototyping and Testing
jobDescription:
Role: Hardware Design Engineer - AI Camera Development

Position Title: Hardware Design Engineer - AI Camera Development

Location: Pune, Noida and Navi Mumbai

Employment Type: Full-time

Experience Level: Mid-Senior

About the Role:

We are seeking a skilled Hardware Design Engineer to join our team focused on AI camera development. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing hardware components integral to advanced AI-driven camera systems. Your work will directly contribute to creating cutting-edge technology in AI-powered imaging.

Key Responsibilities:

Hardware Design and Development:

  • Design and develop hardware architecture for AI camera systems, including sensors, processors, and power management circuits.
  • Create detailed schematics and PCB layouts for camera modules, ensuring high performance and reliability.
  • Select appropriate components and materials to optimize cost, performance, and durability.

System Integration:

  • Collaborate with software engineers to integrate hardware with AI algorithms and firmware, ensuring seamless operation.
  • Work on the integration of image sensors, microcontrollers, FPGAs, and other hardware components into the overall system architecture.
  • Test and validate hardware designs to meet functional, performance, and safety requirements.

Prototyping and Testing:

  • Develop and test hardware prototypes to verify design concepts and improve the overall system.
  • Conduct simulations and use diagnostic tools to troubleshoot and resolve hardware issues.
  • Work with cross-functional teams to refine designs based on testing and feedback.

Product Optimization:

  • Optimize hardware designs for manufacturability, cost-efficiency, and scalability.
  • Ensure that hardware designs comply with industry standards and regulatory requirements.

Documentation and Reporting:

  • Prepare detailed technical documentation for hardware designs, including specifications, testing protocols, and user manuals.
  • Report progress and results to stakeholders, providing recommendations for improvements.

Education Qualifications:

  • Masters degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, or a related field.

Experience Qualifications:

  • 7-9 years of experience in hardware design, preferably in camera systems, AI devices, or related fields.
  • Experience with PCB design software such as Altium Designer, Cadence Allegro, or similar tools.
  • Proven track record of developing and bringing hardware products to market.

Technical Skills:

  • Strong knowledge of digital and analog circuit design.
  • Expertise in VLSI and RTL design.
  • Experience with sensor integration, signal processing, and power management circuits.
  • Familiarity with AI and machine learning concepts as they relate to hardware.
  • Proficiency in using simulation tools for circuit design and analysis.
  • Understanding of EMI/EMC considerations and thermal management in hardware design.
  • Basic understanding of edge AI computing and AI models.

Soft Skills:

  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
  • Excellent communication skills for reporting and documenting design processes.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with AI camera systems or image processing hardware.
  • Knowledge of Jetson Nano module integration.
  • Understanding of hardware security and encryption.
  • Familiarity with manufacturing processes and supply chain management.

What We Offer:

  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).
  • Opportunity to work on innovative projects in the AI and imaging industry.
  • Collaborative and dynamic work environment with growth opportunities.
